document_data.name: Aryn Vasar
document_data.text: Death is not the end... not in Chult!
document_data.mainbody: She specialized in hunting the undead, and was willing to help other hunters to lure them out. She sought to cull [[ogre zombie]]s near the [[River Soshenstar]].
document_data.Personality: She was a skeptical woman with a particular distaste for [[undead]] and [[yuan-ti]].
document_data.Relationships: Aryn was a member of the [[Hunters' Guild of Chult]], and could often be found at [[Hunter's Square]] in Port Nyanzaru.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]]{{ToA-time}} Aryn perceived an increase in the number of undead haunting the jungles outside Port Nyanzaru. She became interested in hunting a evil spirit known as [[Maita]] as well as an undead abomination known as [[Split-ti]], a [[lich]] known as [[Thazar-De]], and a [[beholder]] called [[Erjellel]].
